hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Center Room Pit Fall: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Bombs (20 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Elevator Room Recovery Heart 2

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #the Minuet of Forest#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Coffin Recovery Heart 2

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Wallet# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Please don't abandon this seed. Our world deserves saving!

hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Back Left Bombable Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Forest Temple#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Barinade#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Sun's Song#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #the Song of Storms#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #5# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Nocturne of Shadow#.
